content.description: Sit Start on the bottom, left side of the boulder, which is the most downhill portion, on a huge perfectly detached block that creates an awesome horizontal crack to start on (not loose at all).(same start as the left mantle). negotiate up to the lip and mantle up through the left side knobs, topping out to the left of the start block.
content.location: Sit Start on the bottom, left side of the boulder, which is the most downhill portion, on a huge perfectly detached block that creates an awesome horizontal crack to start on (not loose at all).(same start as the left mantle).

content.description: Sit start on the bottom block, on the portion of stone that is a huge detached block, creating a perfect horizontal crack handhold. (its not loose at all)... stand up to the lip of the next block above, get feet up on the first block and negotiate to the top out which is to the right side of the nose through the right side knobs. fun!
content.location: Sit start under the portion of the bottom block that is most underneath the lip of the top block. this will be to the far left portion of the most downhill section of this boulder...

content.description:
This is a small, balanced boulder perched upon another small boulder. 

   Unless you're just learning to climb I wouldnt waste your time climbing here.
